body:
“Noooo!! I dont want that! Amuro finding another man? I want her to only think of me for 10 years atleast!”

anyway guy from the bottom of this comment, I wish you all the best, Keep moving forward until all the cheaters and cucks are eliminated from this world

(2/2) Since this is the latest chapter we have so far, and looking at the artist's record of making double digit chapters, I'm going to stop following this for a while. Who knows, maybe if it comes up on popular, I'll pick it up again, hopefully with the happy ending I hope. For me personally, I hate NTR, really really much. I've been in a long distance relationship before and sometimes my mind will have these thoughts just like MC did. Unfortunately, my story didn't go the happy ending I hoped, when I found out that the scary thoughts I never wished to come true is actually real. That pain I suffered is why I hate NTR so much. Anyway, sorry for making you guys read such a sad story from this online stranger. NTR team, I hope you guys lose this battle. But if I'm wrong, I hope you can find happiness from this tag that I hate so much. -NS

(1/2) I want to be an optimist, I really do, but the overwhelming arguments that this is going to be NTR can't be ignored. You know what, I'll make a theory of this chapter, to throw away some of my attachment if for nothing else. The reason FMC allows MC to cum inside her is because others have already cummed inside her. If you read the previous chapters, you'll notice that MC never cummed inside FMC before, so if she suddenly got pregnant, all suspicion will be confirmed and it will get ugly. So to cover the cheatings, FMC let MC cum inside her, so that if she does get pregnant (from MC or from someone else) she can say that it's MC's child and no one will knows what really happens. I really do hope that this one will actually turns out well instead of going like the other artist's work. People will get bored if the same path is done multiple times, and a lot of people seem to already abandon continuing the story because they are tired of waiting only to be dissapointed.

The ending of this doujin is definitely gonna an NTR one. 
Because most of the work of the author is NTR. And from the hints, it's clear that the ending is an NTR one. 
Bro just show that it's an ntr. Why breaking many guys heart. 
Well I am not in relationship.
Show us the fucking NTR scene already, I'm tired of waiting

Just did some research of the title, it might be the combination of "Itai" means "painful", and "Amai" means "sweet", "painfully sweet" or "bitter sweet". Reading this is heartwarming because of how "sweet" this is, then suddenly hit you with a not-so-sure "painful" NTR. It's possible that the NTR is just fake/misunderstanding/delusion, and only use as a kind of trope for this series but I never read anything like that before. It doesn't matter anyway, fake or real, I don't want to feel shitty while feeling happy, I'm not a masochist for that kind of shit. Don't get me wrong, I'm not an NTR hater, I love Cheating because it is arousingly immoral and I love my Vanilla if it is erotic and wholesome, but I don't want both at the same time, people can do few things at a time, I can't cum while crying lol, it's a phycological suicide. NOT RECOMMENDED, there are so many great NTR and Vanilla out there, don't waste it on this one.
This author's works have 30 or so chapters and it's usually ntr in the middle of it so yeah, brace yourselves bois bcs ntr is comming

And also author very clearly shows that Karin slowly transforms in cock-hungry slut, that obviously leads to her dick-riding rampage during break up.

Oh I am SO right about this series, Ryoh-Zou has taken shit for years with "you make cuck porn!" and he's finally snapped, he's showing a loving relationship developing with a paranoid crazy guy who will fuck things up immensely for himself and have the "Chad" guy who will "help" the girl get her life back together just to fuck her and then dump her.

I will laugh my ass off when this happens because it's a perfect troll, all of you shitting on him for years and he's gonna go 

"Look, they had the perfect relationship (something you'll never have) and he fucked it up! Care for your partner! If you don't you'll lose her!"

I will seriously bust a gut if this is it. If it's not then I've pretty much defended cuck porn for a while and I'll look stupid, oh well...

You know, given Ryoh-Zoh's track record, you'd assume this would turn into NTR. But if it isn't NTR, this would just be his first Vanilla story in a long while. Most of the stories in Ray's Days were pretty wholesome/vanilla with 1 or 2 of them having NTR Bait as well. I think they might just be using that track record to make all the NTR bait in this series into a more Vanilla story without ACTUAL drama.
This shit always gives me anxiety, yet I always keep coming back...
